name: Seung-Hwan Gong
details: Received a B.S. degree in the school of electrical engineering at Hanyang University, Ansan, South Korea. His research interests include CDR, DSP-based Receiver.

name: Dong-Ho Kim
details: Received a B.S. degree in the school of electrical engineering at Hanyang University, Ansan, South Korea. His research interests include DSP-DAC based transmitter.

name: Jae-Geon Lee
details: Currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree in the school of electrical engineering at Hanyang University, Ansan, South Korea. His research interests include Clock and data recovery (CDR) and DSP-based Receiver.

name: Seung-Mo Jin
details: Currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree in the school of electrical engineering at Hanyang University, Ansan, South Korea. His research interests include artificial intelligence hardware design and processing in memory (PIM).

name: Hyeon-Seo Kim
details: Hyeon-Seo Kim received a B.S. degree in the school of electrical engineering at Hanyang University, Ansan, South Korea. He will join the HPIC Design Lab in March 2025.

name: Seol-Hyeon Kim
details: Currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree in the school of system semiconductor enginerring at Sangmyung University, Cheonan, South Korea. Her research interests include artificial intelligence hardware design and processing in memory (PIM).

name: Dong-Jin Kwak
details: Currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree in the school of electrical engineering at Hanyang University, Ansan, South Korea. His research interests include artificial intelligence hardware design and processing in memory (PIM).

name: Dong-eon Jin
details: Currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree in the school of electrical engineering at Hanyang University, Ansan, South Korea.
